Class FileUtility

java.lang.Object
com.hado90.fileMgt.extractor.FileUtility
public class FileUtility extends Object
This utility class provides various file management functions, such as creating folders, deleting files and directories, moving files, and retrieving directory contents. It also offers methods to filter files by type and to work with subdirectories.

      public FileUtility()

  • Method Details

    • createFolder

      public void createFolder(String folderPath)
      Creates a folder in the specified directory path.
      Parameters:
      folderPath - the path where the folder should be created.

    • fileOrDirectoryExists

      public boolean fileOrDirectoryExists(String filePath)
      Checks if a file or directory exists at the specified path.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the path to check.
      Returns:
      true if the file or directory exists, false otherwise.

    • deleteFile

      public void deleteFile(String filePath)
      Deletes the file at the specified path.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the path to the file to be deleted.

    • deleteFolder

      public void deleteFolder(String folderPath)
      Recursively deletes the folder and all its contents (files and subdirectories).
      Parameters:
      folderPath - the path to the folder to be deleted.

    • moveFile

      public void moveFile(String inputFilePath, String outputFilePath)
      Moves a file from one location to another.
      Parameters:
      inputFilePath - the path of the file to move.
      outputFilePath - the destination path for the file.

    • wipeFolderContents

      public void wipeFolderContents(String folderPath)
      Deletes all files from the specified folder, but does not delete the folder itself.
      Parameters:
      folderPath - the path of the folder to wipe.

    • getDirectoryContents

      public List<String> getDirectoryContents(String directoryPath)
      Retrieves a list of file paths in the specified directory.
      Parameters:
      directoryPath - the path to the directory to scan.
      Returns:
      a list of file paths in the directory.

    • filterDirectoryContentByTypes

      public List<String> filterDirectoryContentByTypes(String[] types, List<String> directoryContentPaths)
      Filters the contents of a directory by the specified file types.
      Parameters:
      types - the file extensions to filter by (e.g., "zip", "txt").
      directoryContentPaths - the list of file paths to filter.
      Returns:
      a list of file paths that match one of the specified types.

    • getFileExtensionFromPath

      public String getFileExtensionFromPath(String inputPath)
      Extracts the file extension from a given file path.
      Parameters:
      inputPath - the path to the file.
      Returns:
      the file extension (e.g., "txt"), or an empty string if no extension is found.

    • getSubdirectoryPaths

      public List<String> getSubdirectoryPaths(String directoryPath)
      Retrieves a list of subdirectory paths from the specified directory.
      Parameters:
      directoryPath - the path to the directory to scan.
      Returns:
      a list of subdirectory paths, or an empty list if no subdirectories are found.

    • getSubdirectoryFiles

      public List<String> getSubdirectoryFiles(String directoryPath)
      Retrieves a list of all files (including those in subdirectories) within a directory.
      Parameters:
      directoryPath - the path to the directory to scan.
      Returns:
      a list of file paths within the directory and its subdirectories.
